description: Conduct initial project kickoff meeting with all stakeholders to align on project goals, timeline, and deliverables. Review project charter and establish communication protocols.
comments: Successfully completed with all key stakeholders present.

description: Design comprehensive API architecture including endpoint specifications, authentication mechanisms, rate limiting, and error handling patterns for the integration layer.
comments: Authentication layer completed, working on rate limiting implementation.

description: Configure data mapping rules for inbound data flows including field transformations, validation rules, and error handling for incoming purchase orders and inventory updates.
comments: Initial configuration complete, pending client validation of mapping rules.

description: Execute comprehensive end-to-end testing scenarios covering all integration points, data flows, and business processes to ensure system reliability and data integrity.
comments: Basic integration tests passing, working on complex scenarios.

description: Design and optimize database schema for high-performance data storage and retrieval, including indexing strategies, partitioning, and backup/recovery procedures.
comments: Schema design approved and implemented successfully.

description: Configure automated notification system for outbound events including shipment confirmations, inventory alerts, and exception notifications with appropriate escalation rules.
comments: Email notifications configured, working on SMS integration.

description: Conduct comprehensive load testing to validate system performance under expected and peak traffic conditions, including stress testing and capacity planning analysis.
comments: Test environment setup complete, beginning load test execution.

description: Develop comprehensive user training materials and conduct training sessions for end users, including system navigation, troubleshooting procedures, and best practices.
comments: Training materials in development, scheduling user sessions.

description: Implement comprehensive security configurations including access controls, encryption settings, audit logging, and compliance measures to meet industry security standards.
comments: Security audit completed, addressing final compliance requirements.

description: Facilitate client user acceptance testing phase including test case execution, defect tracking, and sign-off processes to ensure system meets business requirements and expectations.
comments: UAT planning complete, beginning test case execution.
